reviews.review_msg: I was NOT looking forward to taking GEOG 301 - geographic methods & ideology (how bad does that sound!). But Ivor's classes were AMAZING - it was like watching a movie or having a great story told to you. After finishing a bachelors and a master's, I still look back to his class as my favourite. Tough class - but i loved it so much i did well
Awesome course, like a great adventure, very tough teacher but I kicked ass.
